title: AGventure Awaits - Walking in High Cotton

tasks.task: Driving on the farm property to view different crops.
subtasks: Sitting in a vehicle.
Observing bumpy dirt roads.
Noting the presence of plowed fields.
Seeing evidence of past Indian habitation (broken pottery).

tasks.task: Checking seed hoppers and seed brushes.
subtasks: Inspecting yellow plastic bins (seed hoppers).
Examining seed brushes to clean debris from cotton seeds.

tasks.task: Planting cotton seed in different fields.
subtasks: Using equipment to sow cotton seed.
Experimenting with different planting techniques or seed types.
Explaining when the cotton picker is used (fall season).
Identifying parts of the cotton picker (yellow triangles, rotating spindles, black tubes).
Loading cotton into the basket of the picker.
Pressing cotton into round modules.
Noting the weight of a module (6,000 pounds or about three tons).
Transporting modules to a local gin.
Separating cotton into components (seed, lint, trash).
Storing cotton at a warehouse for sale.

tasks.task: Commenting on farm life and daily activities.
subtasks: Mentioning Gardner's enjoyment of space and socializing on the farm.
